message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers a lot of value and would be perfect for you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $100 for it. Let me know if this is something we can work with.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $200 is my bottom line. I believe it reflects the true value of the product.  I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
